refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: enum KeyStyles
refsect2.programlisting: typedef enum { KEYSTYLE_NORMAL, KEYSTYLE_BRANCH, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHBACK, KEYSTYLE_GENERALDYNAMIC, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHMENUS, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHMENUITEMS, KEYSTYLE_MENUITEM, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHTOOLBARS, KEYSTYLE_TOOLBARITEM, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHGUI, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHGUIACTIONS, KEYSTYLE_PAGESELECTION, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHCOMPOSE, KEYSTYLE_TEXTNAV, KEYSTYLE_EDIT, KEYSTYLE_SELECT, KEYSTYLE_TOGGLESELECT, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHALPHABET, KEYSTYLE_SETTINGS, KEYSTYLE_SPELL, KEYSTYLE_WORDCOMPLETE, KEYSTYLE_POINTERCONTROL, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHHYPERTEXT, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHMODAL, KEYSTYLE_HTMLACTION, KEYSTYLE_HYPERLINK, KEYSTYLE_BRANCHTEXT, KEYSTYLE_HELP, KEYSTYLE_ABOUT, KEYSTYLE_DOCK, KEYSTYLE_MOUSE, KEYSTYLE_MOUSEBUTTON, KEYSTYLE_REPEATNEXT, KEYSTYLE_ADDWORD, KEYSTYLE_INSENSITIVE } KeyStyles;

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that's getting initialized.
Pointer to the XML node that contains the key data.
TRUE if the key was initialized, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_key_add_label ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gok_key_add_label (GokKey *pKey, gchar *pLabelText, guint level, guint group, const gchar *vmods);
refsect2.para: Adds a label to the key. This allocates memory for the label that will be freed in gok_key_delete.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that's gets the new label.
TRUE if the key was initialized, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_key_set_output ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gok_key_set_output (GokKey *pKey, gint Type, gchar *pName, AccessibleKeySynthType Flag);
refsect2.para: Sets the output for the key. This allocates memory for the output that will be freed in gok_key_delete.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that's gets the new output.
Type of output (e.g. keysym or keycode)
Pointer to the name string.
Type of key synth output (if relevant)

refsect2.title: gok_key_change_label ()
refsect2.para: Changes the label displayed on the gok key.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that gets the new label.
The new label text.

refsect2.title: gok_key_update_label ()
refsect2.para: Changes the key's label if the modifier state has changed.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that gets an updated label.

refsect2.title: gok_key_get_label_lengthpercell ()
refsect2.para: Calculates the length of the key's label. Some keys span more than one cell so divide the label length into the number of cells.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key you want the to find the label length per cell.
The length of the key's label per cell.

refsect2.title: gok_key_get_label_heightpercell ()
refsect2.para: Calculates the height of the key's label. Some keys span more than one cell so divide the label height into the number of cells.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key you want to find the height.
The height of the key's label per cell.

refsect2.title: gok_key_calculate_font_size ()
refsect2.para: Calculates the font size needed for the key's label to fill the key.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that we're getting the font size for.
If TRUE then calculate the font size needed for the height of the key's label. Note: Both bWidth and bHeight can be TRUE.
The font size, in 1000s of a point (e.g. 9 point is 9000).

refsect2.title: gok_key_set_font_size ()
refsect2.para: Sets the font size for the key.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that gets the new font size.
Font size you want the key's text to be.

refsect2.title: gok_key_set_button_name ()
refsect2.para: Sets the 'name' of the key's label. The 'name' is used to determine the key/label colors from the .rc file. This must be called for every key after it's created and after the label name has been changed.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that gets the new 'name'.

refsect2.title: gok_key_set_button_label ()
refsect2.para: Changes the button label displayed on the key.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that will have it's button label changed.
Text for the button.
Pointer to the key that you want the label for.
A pointer to the label's text string, NULL if no label.

refsect2.title: gok_keylabel_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: GokKeyLabel* gok_keylabel_new (GokKey *pKey, gchar *pLabelText, guint level, guint group, const gchar *vmods);
refsect2.para: Allocates memory for a new key label and initializes the GokKeyLabel structure. Returns a pointer to the new key label, NULL if it can't be created. Add this label to a key so it will be deleted when the key is deleted.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that gets the new label.
Text string for this label.
the level (see XKB spec) for which this label is valid.
the group (see XKB spec) for which this label is valid.
a delimited list of virtual modifier names which must be matched in order for this label to be valid, or NULL if no virtual modifiers are relevant to this label.
A pointer to the new key label, NULL if it wasn't created.
Pointer to the key label that will be deleted.

refsect2.title: gok_key_set_cells ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gok_key_set_cells (GokKey *pKey, gint top, gint bottom, gint left, gint right);
refsect2.para: Changes the cell coordinates (used by the editor).

listitem.simpara: Key that gets it's cells changed.
Top cell for the key.
Bottom cell for the key.
Left cell for the key.
Right cell for the key.
Pointer to the key that gets duplicated
A pointer to the duplicate key, NULL if it was not created.
